# departmentName

**Instance Property**

The name of the department associated with the contact.

## Declaration

```swift
var departmentName: String { get set }
```

## Setting Work Information

- **jobTitle**: The contact’s job title.
- **organizationName**: The name of the organization associated with the contact.
- **phoneticOrganizationName**: The phonetic name of the organization associated with the contact.
